job_description:
• BS Engineering degree or equivalent semiconductor industry experience.
• Experience or knowledge in one or more scripting, programming and visualization tools (i.
• Python, Java, Tableau, Matlab, Microsoft Suite) Completes all required safety training and conducts all work in accordance with safety policies and regulations New College Grad - Engineer, Shift EquipmentBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted a month ago Hands-on experience in the field of data analytics, preferably with experience querying databases Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to efficiently organize tasks and projects Intermediate PC skills including a familiarity with MS Office Word, Excel, PowerPoint Proven ability to troubleshoot complex problems and address root causes Intermediate data extraction, analysis, and reporting skills Proven ability to communicate and present effectively.
• However, other engineering or related disciplines may be considered.
